theme.title: Theory. Four-parts harmony
theme.para: **** Explicar lo que tiene que hacer el alumno *****.
** Describir los enlaces en el ToolBox **

The four-parts harmony exercise is oriented to learn and practice (write, listen to) four-parts harmony. Its main purpose is checking and explaining every error you've done in writing the harmony for the proposed score.
It allows for two exercise types:

itemizedlist.listitem: Given a bass you have to write the other three voices.
Given a soprano melody you have to write the harmony.

theme.para: The score can be saved so that later you can continue the exercise. It uses the score editor to display the problem and to accept the solution from the user.
